Class RowLoopManipulatorWatcher

RowLoopManipulatorWatcher
public class RowLoopManipulatorWatcher

Class RowLoopManipulatorWatcher implements a watcher to be used with class RowLoopManipulator.

This class is meant to be used only in cooperation with class RowLoopManipulator. See that class for more details.

See Also:
RowLoopManipulator

Constructor Summary
RowLoopManipulatorWatcher(var $manipulator, var $column)
          Construct a new watcher
 
Method Summary
 void check(var $row, var $index)
          Check a row and call all registered methods if the watched column has changed.

          Register a method to call on the manipulator when the watched column changes.
 void unregister(var $method)
          Unregister a method from this watcher.
 

Constructor Detail

RowLoopManipulatorWatcher

public RowLoopManipulatorWatcher(var $manipulator,
                                 var $column)
Construct a new watcher
Parameters:
$manipulator - the loop manipulator this watcher is for
$column - the column this watcher is for
$manipulator - is passed by reference
Method Detail

check

public void check(var $row,
                  var $index)
Check a row and call all registered methods if the watched column has changed.
Parameters:
$row - the row to check
$index - the index of the current row
$row - is passed by reference

register

public void register(var $method)
Register a method to call on the manipulator when the watched column changes. If the specified method is already registered, nothing happens.
Parameters:
$method - the method to call when the watched column changes

unregister

public void unregister(var $method)
Unregister a method from this watcher. If the method wasn't registered in the first place, nothing happens.
Parameters:
$method - the method to remove from the list of registered methods
